item.title: Zuci: Multiplayer Phy-gital game
item.description: Type of Project Tags Academic Game Design, Interaction Design Guide Tools used Prof. Uday Athavankar Unity, Photoshop, Illustrator, Colors and Paper Folk musical instruments form an integral part of one's community. Due to the lack of practitioners, rigorous processes of construction(of these instruments) the audience base of these instruments have decreased considerably.
